The Citizen Councilor Network is overseen by the King County Auditor's Office in Seattle.

This method is used in support of the Countywide Community Forums (of King County).

Notes

The cost to conduct a "round" of the network is highly variable. The more volunteer support you can find the lower the costs will be. The maximum cost is estimated to be the amount if a single round (of perhaps 1000-2000 participants) is totally underwritten for all elements: video production of the issue(s), printing, distribution, meeting management, public relations, web support, etc. This amount should be within the financial means of philanthropic organizations and/or government assistance programs.

For more information, please leave a message for John Spady at: +1-206-296-1633. I will return your call asap.
